  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AcrossWebModuleDevSettings
     
    AcrossWebTemplateConfig
    Configures web template support with automatic registration of named web templates.
    CharacterEncodingConfiguration
    Registers a default CharacterEncodingFilter as the very first filter in the chain.
    ConversionServiceConfiguration
    Creates a default FormattingConversionService bean registered as *mvcConversionService* if none is available from the parent context.
    ConversionServiceConfiguration.ConversionServiceExposingInterceptorConfiguration
    Exposes the ConversionService to all prefixing mappers by default.
    DynamicServletConfiguration
    Registers all ServletContextInitializer beans created in any module or in the Across context itself.
    GlobalViewElementBuilderContextConfiguration
    Responsible for adding the ViewElementBuilderContextInterceptor.
    JstlViewSupportConfiguration
    Creates a JSP/JSTL view resolver.
    ThymeleafViewSupportConfiguration
    Registers Thymeleaf support for all files with .html or .thtml extension.
    UrlPrefixingConfiguration
    Registers the PrefixingPathRegistry.
